name: Voice -Controlled Demo "Magic inc."
description:
BEWARE, loud noises. Make sure your Microphone is connected and you give Chrome access. Only works in Google Chrome.

Oh, and it's best to use headphones.

Simply move the mouse in circles while clicking the left mouse button and the game will recognize the input. You will get sound feedback if you're using your "wand".

Words to get through the demo:

  • crepitus
  • aqua/ water spell
  • amica
  • musica

Spells you can try at the end:

  • lumos
  • riddiculus
  • pyro
  • aqua
  • reducio

This also runs in mobile chrome on smartphones via touchscreen, but if your phone's resources are too low, the game might stop responding.

The "wand" was an actual wand with an Arduino BLE in it das would recognize movement. But since most people don't have that at home, I figured mouse input would make the most sense.
